title: cryptocurrency payment system
extract: Cryptocurrency as a means of payment. ... The process is known as “mining”, with the “miners” forming a network of computing resources that validate transactions with the respective cryptocurrency. In return, each miner receives a small portion of the cryptocurrency that is created.Jan 18, 2018
